gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: SOERE OLA, Observatory on Alpine LAkes

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: SOERE OLA, Observatory on Alpine LAkes
SOERE OLA, Observatoire des LAcs alpins

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString:
This SOERE aims at understanding and modelling the dynamics and ecological functioning of lake ecosystems affected by local and global forcing factors. Three peri -alpine lakes (Lakes Geneva , Annecy, Bourget) and their watersheds are monitored. These systems represent important natural resources and meet key societal demands (drinking water, fishing, tourism, biodiversity ... ) .
The services provided by the Soere relates to both long-term in situ observation and experimentation.
The observatory task is based on logistic, technical and analytical supports for (i) collecting environmental data (physico- chemical and biological), (ii) creating and managing database (ii) organizing the storage of reference biological samples. The accession to the data is possible according to the 'Terms & Conditions of Use' of the Soere Database.
The SOERE OLA can provide logistic supports for sampling, in situ measurements and experimentation on Lake Geneva. This service is submitted to validation according to the " Logistic Support Leman" service charter. The SOERE OLA has Allenvi label.

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString:
This SOERE aims at understanding and modelling the dynamics and ecological functioning of lake ecosystems affected by local and global forcing factors. Three peri -alpine lakes (Lakes Geneva , Annecy, Bourget) and their watersheds are monitored. These systems represent important natural resources and meet key societal demands (drinking water, fishing, tourism, biodiversity ... ) .
The services provided by the Soere relates to both long-term in situ observation and experimentation.
The observatory task is based on logistic, technical and analytical supports for (i) collecting environmental data (physico- chemical and biological), (ii) creating and managing database (ii) organizing the storage of reference biological samples. The accession to the data is possible according to the 'Terms & Conditions of Use' of the Soere Database.
The SOERE OLA can provide logistic supports for sampling, in situ measurements and experimentation on Lake Geneva. This service is submitted to validation according to the " Logistic Support Leman" service charter. The SOERE OLA has Allenvi label.

L’ambition de ce soere est d’observer, de comprendre, et [[in fine]] de modéliser l’évolution de l’état et des fonctionnements écologiques d’écosystèmes lacustres soumis à un changement des pressions d’anthropisation locales et aux changements globaux en cours.
Les objets observés sont les systèmes constitués par les 3 grands lacs péri-alpins (Léman, Annecy, Bourget) et leurs bassins versants. Ils représentent des ressources naturelles considérables et sont au centre d’une forte demande sociétale régionale (eau potable, pêche, tourisme, biodiversité…).
Les types de services associés à ces zones lacustres instrumentées concernent à la fois l'observation in situ sur le long terme et l'expérimentation.
Le volet observatoire s'appuie sur des moyens techniques et analytiques pour l'obtention de données environnementales (physico-chimiques et biologiques), la constitution et la gestion de banques de données, le stockage et l'archivage d'échantillons de référence. L'accès à la base de données est ouvert selon la charte d'accès établie (Conditions Générales d'Utilisation). Par ailleurs, le soere OLA peut fournir des moyens d'accès (prélèvements, mesures in situ) et d'appui aux expérimentations sur le lac Léman. Ce service est réglementé selon la charte d' "Appui Logistique Léman". Le SOERE OLA a la labellisation Allenvi.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: COMMISSION REGULATION (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: COMMISSION REGULATION (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: The data temporal extents are depending on parameters. Older data are physical chemistry from 1957 on Lake Geneva. They have been validated by scientists when they are been acquired but were transcribed from their paper version to a digital version thereafter. The SOERE OLA is a service of AnaEE-France Infrastructure.

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: The data temporal extents are depending on parameters. Older data are physical chemistry from 1957 on Lake Geneva. They have been validated by scientists when they are been acquired but were transcribed from their paper version to a digital version thereafter. The SOERE OLA is a service of AnaEE-France Infrastructure.

Les données sont sur des étendues temporelles variables selon leur type. Les plus anciennes sont des données de physico chimie à partir de 1957 concernant le lac Léman Elles ont été validées par des scientifiques au fur et à mesure de leur acquisition puis retranscrites de leur version papier vers une version numérique par la suite. Le SOERE OLA est un des services de l'infrastructure AnaEE-France.
